title: 2019년 Orozco 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Orozco. 판결일: 2019-02-26. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff - Appellant, v. Gregory OROZCO, Defendant - Appellee.
**판결일**: 2019-02-26
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Kelly, Lucero, Seymour

## 변호인

Carrie N. Capwell, Assistant United States Attorney (Stephen R. McAllister, United States Attorney, District of Kansas, James A. Brown, Assistant United States Attorney, Chief, Appellate Section, with her on the briefs), Kansas City, Kansas, for Plaintiff - Appellant., James R. Campbell, Coffman & Campbell, Burlington, Kansas, for Defendant - Appellee.

## 인용

- 916 F.3d 919

## 판결문 요약

                                                                            Elisabeth A. Shumaker
                             FOR THE TENTH CIRCUIT                              Clerk of Court
